## SkillsForge

Sign up by clicking [here](https://skillsforge.warwick.ac.uk/warwick/#he/dev/eventDetails,;em,providerCode=ST,providerOrgAlias=warwick,number=3,) or by going to <https://skillsforge.warwick.ac.uk> and searching for "R for Data Science".

After the course, e-mail [ella.m.kaye@warwick.ac.uk](mailto:ella.m.kaye@warwick.ac.uk) with the password and she'll register you as having attended.

You will be given the password at the **end** of the course.
